Pre-Game Insights: San Antonio Spurs (18-17, ninth in the Western Conference) vs. Chicago Bulls (16-19, 10th in the Eastern Conference)
Chicago has gone 6-11 in home games
Chicago ranks third in the Eastern Conference in rebounding averaging 45.1 rebounds
Nikola Vucevic leads the Bulls with 10.1 boards
San Antonio is 10-3 when it turns the ball over less than its opponents and averages 14.1 turnovers per game
The Bulls are shooting 46.9% from the field this season, 1.6 percentage points higher than the 45.3% the Spurs allow to opponents
The Bulls average 13.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.1 more makes per game than the Bulls allow
